Package classes

package classes
  • Class
    Description
    Course
    Represents a course in a secondary school.
    DaysOfWeek
    Interface defining constants for days of the week in Portuguese and providing a method to retrieve a list of these days.
    GlobalVariables
    A utility class to hold global variables for the application.
    Person
    Represents a person with basic attributes like name, gender, birthday, and address.
    PredefinedCourses
    Interface defining a set of predefined courses and subjects for an educational system.
    PredefinedSubjects
    Interface defining a set of predefined academic subjects.
    SchoolClass
    Represents a school class, including details such as class name, students, subject teachers, subjects offered, and a timetable.
    Student
    Represents a student, extending the Person class.
    StudentGrade
    Represents a student's grade for a specific subject.
    Subject
    Represents an academic subject with attributes for subject name, lists of enrolled students and assigned teachers.
    Teacher
    Represents a teacher, extending the Person class.
    TimeCell
    Represents a time slot in a school timetable.
